MSB Officers ~4~ April 28* 1954
answered today, staff (Holt, Walkerf Biason, etc.) waiting for answers
to routine questions, week-end visitors, etc. do leave too little time
for serious thinking and planning.
Finally if some of my things (particularly) are too long, please
forgive me. As Pascal said "Sorry, I didn't have time to make them
^shorter." And if you have any criticisms, fellows, will you please shoot
them direct at me? I liked John’s direct recent letter re. my not giving
time to reply, on that score. (I could reply about being caught between
the need to do something and need to get responses, but 1 think you all
know the feeling). I’ll try to be equally honest and frank with you.
Sorry I can t be any other way.
One things if the Hewglfttep is to carry neyg of members,
Regional Directors will haye to help us. Can not canvas every member
individually. Pleasel
